import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Grid, Form, Button, Input, Message, Select, Icon, Table, Card } from "semantic-ui-react"; import Layout from "../../components/Layout"; import investMintFactory from "../../ethereum/investMintFactory"; import web3 from "../../ethereum/web3"; import { Router } from "../../routes"; class InvestMintNew extends Component { state = { tokenName: "", tokenSymbol: "", errorMessage: "", tokensPerBlock: "1000", minimumReturn: "10", blocksToStabilize: "75", blockPricingInput1: "#", blockPricingInput2: "1000", blockPricingOperand: "/", stableMintFee: "0.1", loading: false }; onSubmit = async event => { event.preventDefault(); this.setState({ loading: true, errorMessage: "" }); try { const accounts = await web3.eth.getAccounts(); const newToken = await investMintFactory.methods .createToken( this.state.tokenName, this.state.tokenSymbol, this.state.blockPricingInput1 == "#" ? "0" : this.state.blockPricingInput1, this.state.blockPricingOperand, this.state.blockPricingInput2 == "#" ? "0" : this.state.blockPricingInput2, this.state.blocksToStabilize, web3.utils.toWei(this.state.stableMintFee, "ether"), web3.utils.toWei(this.state.tokensPerBlock, "ether") ) .send({ from: accounts[0] }); const tokenUrl = "/t/" + newToken; window.location.assign(tokenUrl); } catch (err) { this.setState({ errorMessage: err.message }); } this.setState({ loading: false }); }; render() { return (

Create New InvestMint Token

this.setState({ tokenName: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ tokenSymbol: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ blockPricingInput1: event.target.value, blockPricingInput2: event.target.value != "#" ? "#" : this.state.blockPricingInput2 }) } > this.setState({ blockPricingOperand: event.target.value }) } > this.setState({ blockPricingInput2: event.target.value, blockPricingInput1: event.target.value != "#" ? "#" : this.state.blockPricingInput1 }) } > this.setState({ tokensPerBlock: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ blocksToStabilize: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ stableMintFee: event.target.value }) } />
); } } export default InvestMintNew;
